title: Smoothing
text:
library(mgcv); library(data.table); library(gratia); library(marginaleffects); library(ggplot2); library(dplyr); library(tidyr); library(zoo); library(slider)
#####test Paracou####
obs <- read.csv(â€œG:/My Drive/cesab bioforest/Data/aggregated_data_v9.csvâ€)
setDT(obs)
obs=obs[obs$Site==â€œParacouâ€]
unique(obs$Plot)
setnames(obs, â€œPlotâ€, â€œsubplotâ€)
obs\(plot=gsub("_.", "",obs\)subplot )
obs <- obs[!Year%in%1984:1990]
obs <- dcast( obs, subplot + plot + Year ~ variable, value.var = â€œvalueâ€ )

title: example plot: Interaction effects between VPD, CWM, and Treatment on Tree Growth
text:
Code
# Load required packages
library(data.table)
library(ggplot2)
library(effects)


Loading required package: carData


lattice theme set by effectsTheme()
See ?effectsTheme for details.


Code
library(interactions)
library(tidyverse)


â”€â”€ Attaching core tidyverse packages â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€ tidyverse 2.0.0 â”€â”€

âœ” lubridate 1.9.4     âœ” tibble    3.3.0
âœ” purrr     1.1.0     âœ” tidyr     1.3.1


â”€â”€ Conflicts â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€ tidyverse_conflicts() â”€â”€

âœ– dplyr::filter()      masks stats::filter()
âœ– dplyr::first()       masks data.table::first()
âœ– lubridate::hour()    masks data.table::hour()
âœ– lubridate::isoweek() masks data.table::isoweek()

âœ– lubridate::quarter() masks data.table::quarter()
âœ– lubridate::second()  masks data.table::second()

Code
# Set random seed for reproducibility
set.seed(123)

dat <- data.frame(
Treat = factor(rep(c("Control", "Disturbed"), each = 60))
)

dat$CWM <- runif(120, 2, 5)
dat$VPD <- runif(120, 1, 3)

# Define growth with different VPD sensitivity
dat$growth <- ifelse(dat$Treat == "Disturbed",
                     5 + 1.2*dat$CWM - 1.5*dat$VPD + rnorm(60, 0, 0.5),  # disturbed: strong VPD effect
                     5 + 1.2*dat$CWM - 0.5*dat$VPD + rnorm(60, 0, 0.5))  # control: weaker VPD effect
head(dat)


    Treat      CWM      VPD    growth
1 Control 2.862733 2.295787  6.755723
2 Control 4.364915 1.639641 10.049670
3 Control 3.226931 1.615440  7.889772
4 Control 4.649052 1.439535  9.426339
5 Control 4.821402 1.738978  9.798054
6 Control 2.136669 2.968438  5.981196


Code
model <- lm(growth ~ VPD * CWM * Treat, data = dat)
summary(model)



Call:
lm(formula = growth ~ VPD * CWM * Treat, data = dat)

Residuals:
     Min       1Q   Median       3Q      Max 
-1.14081 -0.30153 -0.04961  0.21521  1.49263 

Coefficients:
                       Estimate Std. Error t value Pr(>|t|)    
(Intercept)             4.82076    1.06599   4.522 1.53e-05 ***
VPD                    -0.63005    0.50524  -1.247    0.215    
CWM                     1.25820    0.28895   4.354 2.97e-05 ***
TreatDisturbed         -1.08060    1.62275  -0.666    0.507    
VPD:CWM                 0.03089    0.13908   0.222    0.825    
VPD:TreatDisturbed     -0.61872    0.79041  -0.783    0.435    
CWM:TreatDisturbed      0.42336    0.44033   0.961    0.338    
VPD:CWM:TreatDisturbed -0.16524    0.21611  -0.765    0.446    
---
Signif. codes:  0 '***' 0.001 '**' 0.01 '*' 0.05 '.' 0.1 ' ' 1

Residual standard error: 0.4724 on 112 degrees of freedom
Multiple R-squared:  0.933, Adjusted R-squared:  0.9288 
F-statistic: 222.7 on 7 and 112 DF,  p-value: < 2.2e-16


Code
plot(allEffects(model))









Code
interact_plot(model, pred = "VPD", modx = "CWM", plot.points = FALSE) +
theme_minimal(base_size = 14)









Code
interact_plot(model,
pred = VPD,
modx = CWM,
mod2 = Treat,
modx.values = "plus-minus",
plot.points = FALSE,
interval = FALSE) +
theme_minimal(base_size = 14)
